subtitleNullable: George Moody PhysioNet Challenge 2022: Classification of heart sounds
descriptionNullable: The data were collected from a pediatric population during two mass screening campaigns conducted in Northeast Brazil in July-August 2014 and June-July 2015. The target population was individuals who were 21 years old or younger who presented voluntarily for screening with a signed parental or legal guardian consent form. All participants completed a sociodemographic questionnaire and subsequently underwent a clinical examination, a nursing assessment, and cardiac investigations. A detailed description of the dataset can be found here: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?tp=&arnumber=9658215
title: The CirCor DigiScope Phonocardiogram Dataset
subtitle: George Moody PhysioNet Challenge 2022: Classification of heart sounds
description: The data were collected from a pediatric population during two mass screening campaigns conducted in Northeast Brazil in July-August 2014 and June-July 2015. The target population was individuals who were 21 years old or younger who presented voluntarily for screening with a signed parental or legal guardian consent form. All participants completed a sociodemographic questionnaire and subsequently underwent a clinical examination, a nursing assessment, and cardiac investigations. A detailed description of the dataset can be found here: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?tp=&arnumber=9658215
